channel.title: Global Beast Tamer: I Can See the Path of Evolution
channel.description: After traveling through time, I got the weakest little snowball as my pet, which couldn’t even evolve? Do I really have to be a waste for the rest of my life? Ding! The System lights up! What! I actually saw the hidden evolution route! Who said it was the weakest! Evolve! Ice Queen! 全球御兽：我能看见进化路线

image.title: Global Beast Tamer: I Can See the Path of Evolution
